panels.title: ARCHIVE STATS AVERAGED OVER ALL SMS

targets.query: SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("rate")  AS A FROM "ObjectsSaved" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(null)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("raw")  AS A FROM "ArchiveQueue" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("rate")  AS A FROM "ObjectsLoaded" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS A FROM "ArchiveFsyncTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS A FROM "ArchiveDirectoryTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS A FROM "ArchiveWriteTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ 
 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS A FROM "ArchiveReadTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ 
 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS A FROM "ArchiveSyncThrottleTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS A FROM "ArchiveBandwidthThrottleTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("rate")  AS A FROM "DiskWritten" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT mean("rate") FROM "ObjectsSaved" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host","pid" fill(0)

SELECT SUM(M) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") AS M FROM "ObjectsSaved" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND  ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"
SELECT mean("rate") FROM "ObjectsSaved" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host","pid" fill(0)

SELECT - SUM(M) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") AS M FROM "ObjectsLoaded" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND  "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"
SELECT mean("value") AS M FROM "ArchiveFsyncTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(0)

SELECT SUM(M) FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS M FROM "ArchiveFsyncTime" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

SELECT - SUM(M) FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS M FROM "ArchiveDirectoryTime" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

SELECT SUM(M) FROM (SELECT last("raw") AS M FROM "ArchiveQueue" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last("raw") AS B FROM "WriteThrottleSetting" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction') AND "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("rate") FROM "DiskWritten" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(0)

SELECT SUM(M) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") AS M FROM "DiskWritten" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

panels.title: Journal stats averaged over all SMs

targets.query: SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS A FROM "JournalFsyncTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS A FROM "JournalDirectoryTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS A FROM "JournalWriteTime" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("raw")  AS A FROM "JournalQueue" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("rate")  AS A FROM "JrnlBytes" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")
SELECT mean(B) FROM (SELECT last(A) AS B FROM (SELECT mean("rate")  AS A FROM "JrnlWrites" WHERE "nodetype" = 'Storage' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "host" fill(none)) GROUP BY "host")

SELECT SUM(M) FROM (SELECT mean("raw") AS M FROM "JournalQueue" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"
SELECT mean("value") *100 FROM "JournalFsyncTime" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(0)

SELECT SUM(M) FROM (SELECT mean("value")*100 AS M FROM "JournalFsyncTime" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

SELECT - SUM(M) FROM (SELECT mean("value")*100 AS M FROM "JournalDirectoryTime" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND ("nodetype" = 'Storage') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Milliseconds" WITH KEY = "host"
